cases.title: Jails & Prisons Expert Witness' Testimony Allowed in Part in 14th Amendment Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Jails & Prisons Expert Witness could testify on the segregation of a prisoner, but not on the defendants' record keeping standards.

cases.title: Plaintiff's Human Factors Expert Witness Testimony is Limited in Products Liability Case
cases.description: A Human Factors Engineering Expert Witness was excluded from testifying on design defects, but could testify on human factors and warnings.

cases.title: Neurology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Regarding Brain Injury in Car Crash
cases.description: The U.S. District Court, Middle District of Louisiana allowed Plaintiff's Neurology Expert Witness to testify as he was the treating physician.
